DOC.brief_summary: The purpose interview study learn adult would join walk program . This study involve interview person 65 year age old . The interview take approximately 25 minute . A total 132 people enrol . This study examine utility value various potential feature incentive-based walk program . These data enable u monitor improve upon enrollment incentive-based walking program .
DOC.criteria: age 65 old self rat health least good scale poor , fair , good , good , excellent self report physical reason exercise health condition would interfere active self report able walk least 2 block without assistance stop participate daily walk exercise program
